Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging

Interface MessageTransceiver

All Superinterfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter
All Known Subinterfaces:
Broadcaster, CheckTrait, FailureReporter, LanguageTrait, Listener, Logger, MessageCounter, Repeater, RepeaterMixin, ResultTrait, TryTrait, UncheckedCode<Value>, UncheckedVoidCode
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseLogger, BaseRepeater, BaseStringMap, Batcher, BroadcastingProgressReporter, CaseFoldingStringMap, ConcurrentBroadcastingProgressReporter, Console, ConsoleLogger, Debug, JavaVirtualMachine, KivaKit, KivaKitThread, LogServiceLogger, MessageAlarm, MessageChecker, MessageList, Multicaster, NullLogger, Project, RepeatingThread, Result, Retry, StateMachine, StringMap, ThrowingListener, VariableMap
public interface MessageTransceiver extends Transceiver
Methods that transmit different kinds of messages.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
